## OSSEventBroker.handle() method

Handles incoming messages from OneSpan Sign by passing the message to an appropriate handler (if set).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
handle(message: Readable | string | Record<string, any>): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  message | Readable \| string \| Record&lt;string, any&gt; | Incoming message. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
